mixed-citation.named-content: Brachychaeteuma melanops H. K. Brade-Birks & S. G. Brade-Birks 1918
mixed-citation.article-title: Atlas of European millipedes 3: Order Chordeumatida (Class Diplopoda)

tp:treatment-sec.p: In most places strongly associated with cultivated sites in urban and suburban locations. Also in woodlands and cave entrances in France .
